name: KeyboardEvent.ctrlKey
description: The KeyboardEvent.ctrlKey read-only property returns a Boolean that indicates if the control key was pressed (true) or not (false) when the event occured.

refs.name: Document Object Model (DOM) Level 3 Events Specification
refs.description: The definition of 'KeyboardEvent.ctrlKey' in Document Object Model (DOM) Level 3 Events Specification.
